Recipe.Name: SharePointApplication15
Recipe.Caption: SharePoint 2013 - Application
Recipe.Description: Creates a SharePoint 2013 application (farm solution). The application contains an empty SharePoint solution project (.wsp), an optional resources project and a deployment project for deploying all WSPs to multiple farms. SPSF Version 4.1, http://spsf.codeplex.com

Page.Title: SharePoint Solution
Page.Help: Enter the settings for the initial SharePoint Solution

Field.Label: WSP Filename
Field.Help: Optional String. Displays the name of the of the web solution package (wsp)

Field.Label: SharePoint Solution Name
Field.InvalidValueMessage: Must be a valid .NET namespace identifier (e.g. it shouldn't contain spaces or special characters).
Field.Help: Required String. Specifies the name of the solution. The final wsp name will be a combination of the application name (name of the VS.NET solution) and the solution name.

Field.Label: Deployment Server Type
Field.Help: Optional String. Specifies the type of deployment server.

Field.Label: Deployment Target
Field.Help: Optional String. Specifies the deployment target.

Field.Label: Reset Webserver
Field.Help: Optional Boolean. If checked the option "ResetWebServer" in the solution manifest is set to TRUE.

Field.Label: Sandboxed solution
Field.Help: Optional Boolean. If checked a sandboxed solutions will be created.
